channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Memo to the future
item.description: The experience of the now is often more vivid than a distant memory. As a result, we can make decisions in the future without enough regard for how we...

item.title: Google’s Gmail Upgrade—Do You Need A New Email Account?
item.description: Your email is now at risk—here's what you need to know.

item.title: Lulled
item.description: Selfish is easy. Short term is easy. Complacent is easy. Turning our head and ignoring the problem is easy. Going along to get along is easy. But easy...

item.title: Kinds of incompetence
item.description: The second worst is the unaware sort. The work doesn’t meet spec, and we don’t even realize it. The worst is uncaring. We know the work doesn’t meet s...

item.title: Don’t steal the revelation
item.description: Learning is a journey of incompetence. First, we realize that there’s something we don’t know. Then we see that we’re going to be better at it, and we...

item.title: Apple Confirms AirPods Pro 2 To Gain New Upgrade ‘In Coming Weeks’
item.description: An Apple AirPods Pro 2 upgrade is the capability to use the earbuds as hearing aid. Changes in U.K. regulations mean Apple will upgrade the software i...

item.title: Return To The Sky By Tina Morris — Review
item.description: A moving memoir by one of the first women to ever lead a raptor reintroduction project.

item.title: TikTok Is Back, But Content Creators Question Its Future
item.description: Creators are reeling from a rapid turn of events this weekend, many questioning the integrity of the platform's future.

item.title: Embracing externalities

item.title: Meta Boycott And TikTok Ban Could Signal Social Media's Transformation
item.description: As TikTok resumes service following its brief ban, fellow social media giant Meta now faces a user boycott amid significant platform changes.
